Free Website Traffic Checker
Free Website Traffic Checker

Analyze traffic, keyword rankings, competitors, and much more for any website.

Check Traffic
For example:
google.com
amazon.com
apple.com
Check Competitor Website Traffic

Get up-to-date website traffic stats, including traffic sources, visitor engagement metrics, mobile & desktop traffic, and more.

Identify SEO Keywords & Rankings

Find out which SEO keywords your competitors are targeting, along with website rankings and traffic estimates.

Analyze Competitor Backlink Profiles

Uncover the number of backlinks and referring domains your competitors have, as well as their Authority Scores and link building strategies.

Explore 50+ Semrush tools and reports to find the best solution to your digital marketing challenges

Get Started
How to Use Our Free Website Tracker

Enter any website domain into the search field above to get insights into:

Website traffic
Engagement statistics
SEO keyword rankings
Backlink analysis
User demographics
Much more

All for free! And you can use the tool as many times as you want — there’s no limit to the number of sites you can check.

Get the website analysis you need. Then use the visitors, traffic, backlink, keyword, and ranking data to optimize your own website.

Why Use Our Website Traffic Checker?

Semrush competitive intelligence tools leverage multiple data sources, clickstream data, real-time search engine results analysis, and continually evolving machine learning algorithms to provide accurate and up-to-date marketing insights.

These website statistics are incredibly valuable. Use them to develop and refine your own strategies and campaigns. And build your business.

And that`s just the beginning. Semrush offers a suite of additional tools to sharpen nearly every aspect of your digital marketing strategy.

1 Step

Semrush receives clickstream data from 3rd party providers and aggregates it.

2 Step

Aggregated data is processed through Semrush’s proprietary machine learning algorithms.

3 Step

Generated Insights are depicted in the traffic analytics and market explorer tools.

Global Website Traffic Rankings

Check top websites on the web ranked by the estimated traffic. Identify and observe trends, track month-over-month changes in rankings and overall performance of the world’s most visited websites.

By Countries

Analyze top websites in 15+ countries and start tapping into overlooked markets. See the traffic reports by country and analyze what websites are most popular in a given region.
